result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing an authentication service with login, registration, token validation, and health check endpoints.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating the authentication service logic within a single entry point (main.go) that handles HTTP requests and responses.

cmd/auth-service/main.go.purpose: This file implements an authentication service with login, registration, token validation, and health check endpoints.
side_effects: Logs requests and recovers from panics
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive user data
